data: NM CARD Myocardial Perfusion MPI/MIBI Treadmill (Module)
Inpatient: Preparation instructions for NM MPI/MIBI Treadmill
Outpatient: Provide patient with instruction pamphlet and appointment summary for NM MPI/MIBI Treadmill
Graded Exercise Test required for billing and NM MPI monitoring
Please select a (CST-) location for the Graded Exercise Test or choose "Print to Paper" (Paper Referral) to print a requisition for faxing to a non-CST site
Routine, Reason: Other (please specify), Schedule as: Outpatient, Reason for Procedure: Myocardial Perfusion Imaging/MIBI

No caffeine 24 hrs prior to exam  Treadmill Contradindications:    Inability to reach 85% of maximum predicted heart rate on treadmill, LBBB, systolic BP above 200 mmHg, severe symptomatic aortic stenosis, MI within 48 hrs, unstable angina, aortic dissection  Relative Contraindication: Aortic Aneurysm, to be assessed at time of exam by Cardiologist
